name: Firefox Collapse favicon, progress ind. & closebtn
description:
Show close button on hover, else favicon/progress indicator. Only applies to selected tab!

Tested on Firefox 29+ on OSX & Win7. Not compatible with many tab extensions.

Other styles from user 142430
additional_info:
Not compatible extensions: "Progress Bar on Tab", "Informational Tab", "Tabextensions 3" and "Tree Style Tab". (probably every extension altering tab layout...)

2014-04-29 : Updated for FFx 29+ Win7. Dropped pre 29 Win7 support.
2012-05-27 : updated to work without using rendering bugs...
